About me

Welcome to my site where I post every bit of what I learn one btye at a time. I am a Javascript developer, my biggest passions are web development and cyber-security. Here you can find some information about me as well as regular blog posts and uploads of projects that I have been working on either solo or as part of a team. My Github (by Nez Mustafa).

If you have a question, would like to contact me regarding a project, or just want to say hi, please contact me on LinkedIn.
